description: An ensemble of at least three predefined initialisations states which describe different states of dominant modes of variability. Namely: warm/cold/neutral El Niño-Southern Oscilation (ENSO) states and strong/weak/neutral  Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) states.
name: threeLongCInitialisations
longName: VolMIP LongC ensemble of three simulations
